SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.*, S.CNTRWK_BEGIN||'~'||S.CNTRWK_END AS CNTRWK_DT FROM ( SELECT FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO , G.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM , GAM_GET_FCLTS_GBN_NM(G.FCLTS_GBN) AS FCLTS_GBN_NM , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM019',G.PRT_AT_CODE) AS PRT_AT_CODE_NM , G.LOC , F.YEAR , F.SN , F.OPERTN_MBY , GAM_GETCODENAME('GAM075',F.OPERTN_MBY) AS OPERTN_MBY_NM , F.CNTRWK_NM , TO_CHAR(F.CNTRWK_BEGIN, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNTRWK_BEGIN , TO_CHAR(F.CNTRWK_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CNTRWK_END , F.CNSTRTR , F.BSNS_RSPNBER , F.CNTRWK_CT , F.PHOTO , F.COMPET_INSPCT_WTNNC , UPDDE FROM FENDER_MAINTENANCE F INNER JOIN FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_F G USING (FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO) WHERE 1 = 1
AND F.YEAR = #sYear#
AND G.FCLTS_GBN = #sFcltsGbn#
AND G.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NM like '%'||#sFcltsMngGroupNm#||'%'
AND CNTRWK_END > TO_DATE(#sCntrwkBegin#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
AND CNTRWK_END < TO_DATE(#sCntrwkEnd#, 'YYYY-MM-DD')+1
ORDER BY PRT_AT_CODE DESC ) S ) T
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM( SELECT T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO , T1.PRT_FCLTY_NM AS PRT_FCLTY_NM ,T2.STRCT_FMT AS STRCT_FMT ,LTRIM(TO_CHAR(NVL(T2.BERTH,0),'99,990')) AS BERTH ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD AS PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD ,T1.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT AS PRT_FCLTY_UNIT ,T1.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT AS PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT ,T2.FENDER_KND_CD AS FENDER_KND_CD ,T2.FENDER_PMNT_ITV AS FENDER_PMNT_ITV ,T2.FENDER_FMT AS FENDER_FMT ,DECODE(T3.FCLTS_MNG_NO,NULL,'','TRUE') CHK_ROLE ,T3.REMARK FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F T1 INNER JOIN CVL_ENG_FCLTY_SPEC_F T2 ON (T1.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND T1.PRT_FCLTY_SE = 'C' AND T1.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD = 'C1' AND T1.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#) LEFT OUTER JOIN FENDER_MAINTENANCE_LIST T3 ON (T2.FCLTS_MNG_NO=T3.FCLTS_MNG_NO
AND T3.FCLTS_MNG_GROUP_NO = #sFcltsMngGroupNo#
AND YEAR = #sYear# AND SN = #sSn#
)
ORDER BY GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ ) S
